name: The Great Journey (Puisquilfautunnom)
description:
English Version of "Le Grand Voyage"

The game was originally made in 2 month for the FLOP France workshop. The theme was to create a game from the design of one of three preselected famicases. I choose this one :


Rebel Boom, design by Anibal YILDIRIM

Music credits :

Ben OThman

https://www.jamendo.com/artist/1235/ben-othman

https://www.jamendo.com/artist/440512/proleter/albums
